trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"></xref> object that either grants or denies the marked target permission to access sections of configuration files.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission"> </xref> objektet som gir eller nekter merkede target-tillatelse til Ã¥ tilgang delene av konfigurasjonsfiler.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermissionAttribute"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermissionAttribute"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The security action represented by an enumeration member of <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sikkerhetshandlingen representeres av et medlem for nummerering av <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines the permission state of the attribute.
Creates and returns an object that implements the <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter og returnerer et objekt som implementerer den <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"> </xref> grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a new <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationPermission> object.

trans-unit.target: Returnerer et objekt som implementerer <xref href="System.Security.IPermission"> </xref>.
